data.text:
Haa, haa……I need to hurry, otherwise the teacher will get mad~! 
Of all times, it had to be my turn to take the trash out……!
data.name: Classmate Uma Musume
data.processed:
<story>Haa, haa……I need to hurry, otherwise the teacher will get mad~! 
<story>Of all times, it had to be my turn to take the trash out……!

data.text:
Wah! ……Whoa. What's wrong? 
You look really worried.
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
<story>Wah! ……Whoa. What's wrong? 
<story>You look really worried.

data.text:
Class Rep Top Road! Sorry, I was in a hurry…… 
Earlier, the teacher called for me since I have an interview soon……
data.name: Classmate Uma Musume
data.processed:
<story>Class Rep Top Road! Sorry, I was in a hurry…… 
<story>Earlier, the teacher called for me since I have an interview soon……

data.text:
Ah, in that case, I'll throw the trash away! 
Go ahead and head to the teacher!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
<story>Ah, in that case, I'll throw the trash away! 
<story>Go ahead and head to the teacher!

data.text:
Eh!? ……Really? Then……can I ask you to do it? 
I'll definitely make it up to you later!
data.name: Classmate Uma Musume
data.processed:
<story>Eh!? ……Really? Then……can I ask you to do it? 
<story>I'll definitely make it up to you later!

data.text:
Ahaha, you don't need to thank me. Something like this'll 
be over in an instant! Do your best in the interview!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
<story>Ahaha, you don't need to thank me. Something like this'll 
<story>be over in an instant! Do your best in the interview!

data.text:
While I was working, I overheard the conversation 
outside my window. And it made me smile.
data.processed:
<story>While I was working, I overheard the conversation 
<story>outside my window. And it made me smile.

data.text:
I turned back to the paperwork that I was working on. 
When I finished, I headed out on to the grounds.
data.processed:
<story>I turned back to the paperwork that I was working on. 
<story>When I finished, I headed out on to the grounds.

data.text: However, when I passed by the garbage area――
data.processed: <story>However, when I passed by the garbage area――

data.text:
Narita Top Road was standing there. There were 
several crows gathered around the bird net 
that prevented them from getting to the garbage.
data.processed:
<story>Narita Top Road was standing there. There were 
<story>several crows gathered around the bird net 
<story>that prevented them from getting to the garbage.

data.text:
…………Don't look at them, ignore them. 
Approach quietly……and then just leave……!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
<story>…………Don't look at them, ignore them. 
<story>Approach quietly……and then just leave……!

data.text: Caaaaw.
data.name: Crow
data.processed: <story>Caaaaw.

data.text: Uwaaah!!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed: <story>Uwaaah!!

data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed: <story>…………Uuuuh………… …………

data.text: ……Huuuuuーーー…………it's fine, it's fine……
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed: <story>……Huuuuuーーー…………it's fine, it's fine……

data.text: Caaaaaaaaw.
data.name: Crow
data.processed: <story>Caaaaaaaaw.

data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
<story>Hiiii!! 
<story>……~~~~~~

data.text: Ah, T-Trainer-san……
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed: <story>Ah, T-Trainer-san……

data.text:
Um, well yeah……when I was a kid, one of them scared me…… 
Even now, I still get reminded of that time……
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
<story>Um, well yeah……when I was a kid, one of them scared me…… 
<story>Even now, I still get reminded of that time……

data.text: ……But when it comes to crows, I can't help it though……
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed: <story>……But when it comes to crows, I can't help it though……

data.text: Eh? You don't need to, I'd feel bad!
data.name: Narita Top Road

choices.text: I'm fine with crows. Let me do it.
I'm fine with crows. Let me do it.

data.processed: <story>Eh? You don't need to, I'd feel bad!

data.text:
……You really helped me out. 
Really, thank you for that.
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
<story>……You really helped me out. 
<story>Really, thank you for that.

data.text:
Aaah~, I'm pathetic! If you hadn't come, 
I'd probably still……really, really, thanks alot!
data.name: Narita Top Road

choices.text: This isn't a big deal though……

data.processed:
<story>Aaah~, I'm pathetic! If you hadn't come, 
<story>I'd probably still……really, really, thanks alot!

data.text:
While it was praiseworthy that she was doing something 
that was left to her and trying to deal with something 
she was bad with, seeing how she was earlier……
data.processed:
<story>While it was praiseworthy that she was doing something 
<story>that was left to her and trying to deal with something 
<story>she was bad with, seeing how she was earlier……

data.text:
……Well, it was a task I had accepted. 
I thought I needed to see it through to the end.
data.name: Narita Top Road

choices.text: But the crows were unexpected, right?
But the crows were unexpected, right?

data.processed:
<story>……Well, it was a task I had accepted. 
<story>I thought I needed to see it through to the end.

data.text:
Well, yeah……even so, 
I couldn't just leave the trash somewhere else.
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
<story>Well, yeah……even so, 
<story>I couldn't just leave the trash somewhere else.

data.text:
And besides, the girl who left it to me, 
I think she believed that I'd see it through to the end.
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
<story>And besides, the girl who left it to me, 
<story>I think she believed that I'd see it through to the end.

data.text: ――In which case, I wanted to live up to those expectations.
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed: <story>――In which case, I wanted to live up to those expectations.

data.text:
No matter how difficult or troublesome. 
I think that's the duty of someone who's being relied upon!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
<story>No matter how difficult or troublesome. 
<story>I think that's the duty of someone who's being relied upon!

data.text: Living up to expectations makes it all worthwhile!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed: <story>Living up to expectations makes it all worthwhile!

data.text: ……though, I guess it's not very convincing when you had to come help me.
data.name: Narita Top Road

choices.text: No, I think it's a great mindset

data.processed: <story>……though, I guess it's not very convincing when you had to come help me.

data.text:
Thanks alot. 
So I'm not just all talk, I'll do my best!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
<story>Thanks alot. 
<story>So I'm not just all talk, I'll do my best!

data.text:
She had a strong sense of responsibility and 
desire to improve. While that was a good thing―― 
I did wish she'd rely on others a little more.
data.processed:
<story>She had a strong sense of responsibility and 
<story>desire to improve. While that was a good thing―― 
<story>I did wish she'd rely on others a little more.

title: An Ominous Shadow On The Road
